course.title: Empire of Dirt: History of the United States West
course.description: This seminar will introduce students to the history of the U.S. West. The course will examine the shifting place, process, idea, cultural memory, conquest, legacies, and environments of the U.S. West throughout American history. Drawing on recent historiography and primary sources such as journals, photography, music, film, and material culture, students will explore how individual people who fell under competing empires, nations, and tribes became a part of the United States. Major themes will include the mapping and the scientific cataloging of the West, racial caricature and exclusion, gender, imperialism, and the increasing role of the federal government.
